name: babeleir
summary: The second year of devine, we were asked to promote a beer that isn't really famous in Belgium. It's called Babeleir and it's a beer brewed in Bretagne with an oyster taste.

target.one: We had to find a way to promote this beer, so I thought about a contest where you have to take the best selfies in order to win a trip on a boat with scubadiving.
target.two: The twist is that you really have to be under water when you take the picture, and the most creative picture wins a couple of tickets for him/her and his/her mates to go on a boat and do scubadiving.

name: WePlant
summary: With the WePlant app I want to motivate people to learn more about nature. Instead of just walking by they can learn something of a rare plant they cross eventually.
maintitle: Nature always wears the color of the spirits.

target.one: The aim of the project was to get people to learn more about the environment on a simplified way. And to also teach them how to plant themselves.
target.two: People can detect which plants or trees are nearby with the map and see how rare it is. They can also add new plants by using the plant recognition tool in the app.
